sub_fields.label: Newsletter Frequency
sub_fields.name: newsletter_frequency
sub_fields.instructions: Add up to three options as it might break the layout when added more. Click 'Add Dropdown option' to add an option.

sub_fields.label: Frequency Value
sub_fields.name: frequency_value
sub_fields.instructions: This value will be used by the application and is not shown to the user.

sub_fields.label: Frequency Label
sub_fields.name: frequency_label
sub_fields.instructions: This text is to be perceived by the users while opting for the newsletter.
